line: Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book and build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up

speaker: Steve Rogers
line: The guy who wanted all that went in the ice seventyfive years ago

speaker: Steve Rogers
line: I think someone else came out

speaker: Steve Rogers
line: You want to keep staring at the wall, or do you want to go to work

line: I mean, it's a pretty interesting wall

line: I thought you and Tony were still gazing into each other's eyes
